TopicTitle: EVA on at KSC has destroyed Kerbin for whole save

Articles.Content:
The science save was created in KSP 1.0, I was gathering science from the various biomes around KSC and when I EVA'd Valentina, Kerbin disappeared. I had EVA'd on this save earlier, but this was the first time i had done so while EVA'ing by clicking on the pod and hitting EVA instead of from the lower right corner. I reverted the flight but Kerbin is completely gone, even from the main KSC screen as can be in the screenshot. I have linked a folder with the Save, KSP.log and screenshot of KSC showing just space.

[https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B-cZkGvXdzz0YzdDemVFNVl3M2M&usp=sharing](https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B-cZkGvXdzz0YzdDemVFNVl3M2M&usp=sharing)

- - - Updated - - -

Restarting KSP has fixed the problem
